SYSTEM: NeOn-Overview-v1.pdf: Página 3
3
<<Texto libre: proyecto, speaker, etc.>>
Economic and socio-technical background
• Opportunity/Need
• To build semantic systems qualitatively far more complex
than the current generation, by building complex applications
integrating large semantic resources.
• Problem
• No adequate ontology engineering infrastructure (at both
methodological and tool level) for the whole application
development lifecycle of the envisaged applications
• Specifically,
inadequate
support
for
large
scale
reuse,
evolution and maintenance, collaborative development, etc..
• Software crisis all over again?
speaker: SYSTEM
